author: epg
msg: If the user passes only a '--no-tests' option, start httpd, but
don't run the tests.  Useful for debugging.

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Update add() API to include noIgnore and addParents parameters.
Add the noIgnore and addParents parameter, pass them to the SVNClient object.
(add): Update to use svn_client_add4(), including noIgnore and addParents
(add): Add a new function with the noIgnore and addParents parameters.

author: hwright
msg: Use the IO library instead of reinventing the recursive directory wheel.
This also solves the problem of intermediate directories which exist, but
directories here, call svn_io_make_dir_recursively() instead.  Also,
take advantage of the new add_parents functionality in svn_client_add4().

author: kfogel
msg: * notes/sparse-directories.txt: Remove some obsolete notes about API
upgrades; they were incorrect in light of r24968 anyway.

author: dongsheng
msg: Update Simplified Chinese translation to r25056
